mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, menu, menuCount, price, amount, regdate FROM order_ WHERE email = #{email } GROUP BY orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, menu, menuCount, price, amount, regdate ORDER BY orderNum DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_ (orderNum, email, storeName, storeLogo, num, tableNum, menu, menuCount, price, amount, regdate) VALUES(#{orderNum },#{email }, #{storeName }, #{storeLogo }, #{num }, #{tableNum }, #{menu }, #{menuCount }, #{price }, #{amount }, SYSDATE)
